column2: "Me? What have I been doing? Researching, or studying I guess."
"I'm on this ship and yet I know nothing about it, so I'm trying to study what I can about it."
"This ship is extremely large. The lobby is only one part of it, there are other sections."
"The city area already extends longer than you can see, but there's also an agricultural, and ocean area too."
"I'd like to go see them someday. Dividing up the labor so strictly doesn't seem like a good idea."
"But I guess if ARKS walked around everywhere in their ARKS uniforms people would be surprised."
"I wonder if there's someone I can talk to about getting into agriculture..."
"I know, I need to focus on healing first. Thanks for worrying."
